channel.title: How do you get your OWN client?
channel.description: Like, I want my very own server client, care to point me in the direction of one?

item.title: How do you get your OWN client?
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

Easyest is to get Deob 317 and modify it to your server’s adress, this way isnt hard.
If you try working it with the latest deob your gonna have a hard time finding how to cause it’s a bit more complicated as 317, and i cant decide if its easy for you…

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get your OWN client?
